author: cnbc.com
title: Western Asset Mortgage posts 4Q profit
text:
PASADENA, Calif. (AP) _ Western Asset Mortgage Capital Corp. (WMC) on Monday reported fourth-quarter net income of $21.4 million, after reporting a loss in the same period a year earlier.
On a per-share basis, the Pasadena, California-based company said it had profit of 51 cents. Earnings, adjusted for non-recurring gains, came to 31 cents per share.
The real estate investment company posted revenue of $44.7 million in the period. Its adjusted revenue was $18 million.
For the year, the company reported net income of $85.1 million, or $2.03 per share, swinging to a profit in the period. Revenue was reported as $75.9 million.
Western Asset Mortgage shares have dropped slightly more than 8 percent since the beginning of the year. In the final minutes of trading on Monday, shares hit $9.11, a fall of almost 10 percent in the last 12 months.
This story was generated by Automated Insights ( http://automatedinsights.com/ap ) using data from Zacks Investment Research. Access a Zacks stock report on WMC at https://www.zacks.com/ap/WMC
